stimulusHtml: If F and f are differentiable functions such that  F ( x ) = ∫ 0 x f ( t ) d t MathType@MTEF@5@5@@48F3@ , and if F ( a ) = − 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F24@ and F ( b ) = − 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F25@ where a<b, which of the following must be true?
choicesHtml: F ( x ) ≤ 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3EFB@  for all x such that a<x<b.
